description: This file contains unit tests for the channel validation functions, specifically validating content for Facebook and WhatsApp, including checks for text length, media support, file size limits, and video duration warnings.

methods.name: validateForFacebook
methods.description: Function that validates Facebook-specific content constraints, such as caption length.

methods.name: validateForWhatsApp
methods.description: Function that validates WhatsApp-specific content constraints, including text length, media type, size, and duration.
